attributes.action: Make Gordon Brown Prime Minister again to handle Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Then we can all rest easy knowing someone competent is handling this
attributes.background:
1) make Gordon Brown a Lord
2) Boris Johnson quits
3) the Queen invites him to lead a government

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a Minister to lose their job.

We have published a petition calling for an emergency National Unity Government, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
